venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest -- Equestrian Parking Lot (#3)

item.description:
The ride/hike is organized by the Southeast Chapter of the Bay State Trail Riders Association in partnership with the Friends of MSSF to benefit the trails fund thru the FMSSF.

Ride out by 10am. Optional 12 mile or 5 mile trail rides. Horses will use trails going left – bikers and hikers will use trails going right.  Hikers welcome with dogs – dogs must be ON LEASH at all times.

John Bescherer and Steve Valero will lead  1 - 2 hr hikes leaving the Equestrian lot approx 10:30am.  There may be others that are willing to lead hikes leaving thru out the morning.

$ 15 ride or walk entry fee includes lunch at 12:30 pm.

Full ride entry form PDF stored here.

Proceeds to benefit the Friends of MSSF – Trails fund

Dust off your cowboy hat, shine up your boots

Polish your saddles boys and girls!!!

We’ll be looking for the best dressed horse and rider teams as well as the best dressed dog of the day

Raffle items & gifts donated by

  • Smartpak Inc
  • Horse Lovers Tack & Apparel – Lakeville MA
  • Friends of Myles Standish State Forest
  • Ocean Spray Cranberries inc
  • Epic Enterprises (Pepsi) – Ayer MA
  • Sysco of Boston - Plympton MA
  • Walmart of Halifax MA
  • White Haven Farm - Upton MA
  • Northeast Hot Fill (Aquafina) - Ayer MA
  • Wicked Cupcakes - Carver MA
  • Alex and Ani - Cranston RI
  • Starrs Market - Lakeville MA
  • Trucchi's  - Middleboro MA
  • Cakes by Miguel - Lakeville MA

Photos & Portraits in the morning (emailed) - $5

At 12:30 Bring your own chair for a lunch of

Baked beans, hot dogs, cornbread, drinks & dessert

Listen to music and enjoy lunch.

Support your trails at Myles Standish State Forest

Donations gladly accepted

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Ye Olde West Trail Ride, Bike or Hike- Postponed from 9/30
